entities.name: lily potter
entities.description: Lily Potter is mentioned as one of the people who lost their lives on this spot. The text states: 'On this spot, on the night of 31 October 1981, Lily and James Potter lost their lives.'

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is mentioned as one of the people who lost their lives on this spot. The text states: 'On this spot, on the night of 31 October 1981, Lily and James Potter lost their lives.'

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the only wizard to have survived the Killing Curse. The text states: 'Their son, Harry, remains the only wizard ever to have survived the Killing Curse.'

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is mentioned as someone who added scribbles around the monument. The text states: 'And all around these neatly lettered words, scribbles had been added by other witches and wizards who had come to see the place where the Boy Who Lived had escaped.'

entities.name: the boy who lived
entities.description: The Boy Who Lived is mentioned as someone who escaped from this place. The text states: 'And all around these neatly lettered words, scribbles had been added by other witches and wizards who had come to see the place where the Boy Who Lived had escaped.'

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as people who cannot see this house. The text states: 'This house, invisible to Muggles, has been left in its ruined state as a monument to the Potters and as a reminder of the violence that tore apart their family.'

entities.name: the potters
entities.description: The Potters are mentioned as a family who lost their lives on this spot. The text states: 'On this spot, on the night of 31 October 1981, Lily and James Potter lost their lives.'

relationships.description: Lily Potter was the spouse of James Potter. The text states: 'On this spot, on the night of 31 October 1981, Lily and James Potter lost their lives.'
James Potter was the spouse of Lily Potter. The text states: 'On this spot, on the night of 31 October 1981, Lily and James Potter lost their lives.'
Harry Potter was the child of Lily Potter. The text states: 'Their son, Harry, remains the only wizard ever to have survived the Killing Curse.'
Harry Potter was the child of James Potter. The text states: 'Their son, Harry, remains the only wizard ever to have survived the Killing Curse.'

Bathilda visited the place where the Boy Who Lived had escaped. The text states: 'And all around these neatly lettered words, scribbles had been added by other witches and wizards who had come to see the place where the Boy Who Lived had escaped.'
